title: Bot Activation
activation_mechanics: Bots activate automatically based on their individual cooldown timers. When a bot activates, it immediately applies its effect to all enemies within its range.

activation_sequence.description: Each bot has an independent cooldown timer

activation_sequence.name: Activation Trigger
activation_sequence.description: When cooldown reaches zero, bot activates

activation_sequence.name: Effect Application
activation_sequence.description: Bot effect is applied to all enemies in range

activation_sequence.name: Duration Timer
activation_sequence.description: Bot remains active for its duration

activation_sequence.name: Cooldown Reset
activation_sequence.description: New cooldown timer begins after activation

amplify_bot.stacking: Works with all damage sources (tower, ultimate weapons, etc.)
